metadata.synopsis: A dialogue with one of the "guards" in House of Hope. These are Eternal Debtors, each one has a story how did they manage to get into Raphael's hands. These characters see players as "debtors" of House of Hope as well and they don't usually know anything about players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Hope in House of Hope and promise to helpteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_HopeIntroduction_Trigger3. Talk to Eternal Debtorteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_FireDebtor01

1.speaker: Smouldering Eternal Debtor
1.text: My blood... it's burning. Sizzling. Do you feel it? Don't come too close.

0.speaker: Smouldering Eternal Debtor
0.text: My bones are kindling. Soon they'll catch light.

2.speaker: Smouldering Eternal Debtor
2.text: Don't look. Don't look or it'll spark. Ignite! Burn me inside to outside until I'm bloody ash and paste. Don't breathe me in!
